ThingDef.label: Disguised Contraband
ThingDef.description:
Expensive illegal goods hidden below a bunch of assorted innocent goods, where no officer of the law would think to check.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

Contraband has a <color=#db5304>reduced</color> risk of being detected when sold compared to base illegal products, however is not totally undetectable.

Contraband is worth approximately <color=#db0404>20% less</color>than the value of the items when sold individually.
